video.title: Care Bears: Adventures in Care-a-lot
video.synopsis: Cheer Bear, Share Bear, Funshine Bear, Grumpy Bear and Oopsy Bear enjoy adventures in Care-a-lot and defend it from Grizzle and his robots.

episodes.synopsis: When Share gets a tummy ache, she learns it's best to own up to her mistakes; Grumpy could use some help creating the Rainbow Night celebration.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Cheer and Share learn what a mess jealousy can make; Wingnut helps Grumpy after he hurts his foot, but Grumpy takes unfair advantage of his kindness.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Grumpy tweaks Amigo's ice cream wagon so it will never run out of treats; when Grizzle serves up a heat wave, Share asks the Thunderwhales for help.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Grizzle makes a lot of trouble for the bears when his invention messes up their badges; when Funshine gets a trophy, he also gets a big head.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: When Share gets hurt playing, Funshine feels guilty and becomes a safety superhero; Grumpy is at his grumpiest, so Cheer tries to make him cheery.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Cheer has a special role in the Starshine Parade, but she gets too involved in everyone's jobs to do hers right; Oopsy wants to adopt a baby star.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Share learns a lesson about popularity when she spends all her time trying to win a Belly Ball ribbon; Funshine is sick in bed and hiccupping bubbles.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Funshine learns that one bear can make a difference when it comes to the environment; Oopsy is hailed as a hero for something he did by accident.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Oopsy wears perfume to get his friends to love him more; Cheer must stop testing her invention and stand guard to protect Care-a-lot from Gobblebugs.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Grizzle tricks Oopsy into delivering a "gift," but the plan backfires; Share makes "rootbear" floats for a lot more bears than she expected.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Funshine and Tenderheart try to out-do each other playing a game of dares; there's a new band in Care-a-lot called the Care Bear Honeys.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: The bears take a risk inviting a newly homeless Grizzle to live with them; Share's Dilly Daisies bloom and become all the rage in Care-a-lot.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Grumpy needs help, but he wants everything done his way; Cheer helps her friends get ready for a big talent contest but forgets to help herself.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: True Heart is embarrassed when she trips in front of the bears and looks foolish; Grumpy tries to keep Care-a-lot's best bumbleberry bush under wraps.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: The bears offer to help Grizzle find his beloved Mr. Beaks; when Grizzle takes over Dreamland, it's up to Bedtime Bear to take back the night.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: The bears teach two little lost clouds about the thrill of new experiences; Grizzle takes the bears' belly badges while a new friend is visiting.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Surprise Day is here, but there's one problem: Harmony hates surprises; clouds Bumpity and Tweazle play with time to make the bears work faster.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: While teaching McKenna a lesson, the bears neglect some of their friends; a missing birthday basket stirs up tension between Love-a-lot and Share.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Harmony is asked to give a concert for all of Care-a-lot, but the honor goes to her head; Oopsy's exaggerations get him into a sticky situation.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Bedtime Bear tries to save Care-a-lot from an oozy pile of pudding; Bumpity and Tweazle are shooting for a snow day but make a "no-snow" day instead.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Grizzle steals Funshine's belly badge as part of a plan to ruin Care-a-lot; Grizzle invites the bears to a "giving party" with unexpected results.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Oopsy wants to race in the Care-a-lot Grand Prix, but he's having the worst luck ever; the bears teach McKenna how to be a better houseguest.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Everyone's riding a bike to McKenna's picnic ... except Grumpy, who doesn't know how; True Heart and Share find it difficult to stick to the facts.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Grizzle hits Tenderheart and Funshine with a memory-zapping "Forget-Me Ray"; a baby Thunderwhale shows McKenna another side of friendship.
episodes.title: Episode 11
